alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lee County through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Carlos Park, or 8 miles south of Fort Myers, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, San Carlos Park, Olga, Southwest Florida Airport, Buckingham, Three Oaks, Villas, Estero and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
